uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing

Class VectorOfPictures

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing.VectorOfPictures

  • public class VectorOfPictures
extends java.lang.Object
    class that contains the vector of picture images, allows drawing and clearing of each element.
    Author:
    Ben Ashwell, Martin Key, Abel Toro
